attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to get a new park at the windfeild reck.  The park we have is so out dated and run down. There is only the swings for little babies to play on and the slides and bouncy toys are old and rusty. I think we need a bigger park catered to all children of all ages do please help by signing this so we can take it to the right people and maybe get a bit more fun for children.
